entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h early this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
